thread.title: Xiaomi Confronts an Unnerving Time
thread.title_full: Xiaomi Confronts an Unnerving Time - WSJ

author: li
title: Xiaomi Confronts an Unnerving Time
text:
In four years, Lei Jun turned his gadget maker, Xiaomi, from nothing into one of the world’s largest makers of smartphones. Xiaomi has rocked China’s phone and accessories markets, shaking up competitors and pursuing international expansion.
Now Mr. Lei is the one who is uneasy.
Xiaomi’s sales grew by one-third in the first half of this year from a year ago, a sizable jump for many companies but a sign of slowing growth after...
